title: How did Donald Trump actually become president?
selftext:
Apologies if this post comes off as naive or far too late. This post is not intended to troll or to take any stance. It’s just a desire to truly understand.

How did Trump actually become president? What were the factors/forces that actually led to his rise to the presidency?

Even my foreign friends were stunned to hear of Trump winning in 2016 since he had zero political experience and was mostly known for his business ventures and appearance on “The Apprentice.”

How does someone with nothing but excess wealth and a tendency to sputter polarizing and controversial words actually become president?
